name: ArterialOxygenSaturationLOINC
title: Arterial oxygen saturation LOINC
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains terms related to oxygen saturation, given in decimal form, from arterial blood),(Data Element Scope: Oxygen saturation laboratory tests whose result is used to evaluate breathing assistance device use as defined by the US Centers for Medicare and Medicaid Services.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes oxygen saturation, as well as calculated method type, property of mass decimal fraction, and results in decimal fractions without units from arterial blood.),(Exclusion Criteria: None)
